alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Becker; Mahnomen; Norman; West Becker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 21 at 2:18PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...LIGHT WINTRY MIX EXPECTED THIS EVENING AND TONIGHT... A relatively fast moving storm system will bring a chance for light wintry precipitation to the area this evening and into the overnight hours. Look for a mix of mainly sleet and light freezing rain, with periods of light snow. There remains about a 10 to 20 percent chance for a light glaze of ice through early Monday morning. Travel impacts are possible during the overnight period and into Monday morning. Roadways and sidewalks could become slick this evening. Those traveling tonight into Monday morning should slow down, use extra caution, and check the latest road conditions from the North Dakota and Minnesota Departments of Transportation.

area.areaDesc: Clay; East Becker; Mahnomen; Norman; West Becker
